hook.text: Instead of talking to Alex directly, Jordan complained about Alex to their manager. Then to Sarah. Then to Lee.

buildup.text: Triangulation is when someone brings a third party into a two-person conflict instead of going direct.

discovery.text: It feels like venting. But it poisons relationships and spreads the conflict wider.

twist.text: The manager who listens to triangulation without redirecting enables it.

climax.text: Redirect: have you told Alex this directly? I'll help you prepare, but this is your conversation.

punchline.text: Don't be the third point. Push people to the direct line.

quiz.question: What is triangulation in team conflict?
options: Involving a third party instead of addressing the conflict directly
A useful mediation technique for resolving disputes
When three people agree on the same position
